statements: SELECT * FROM ParentVolunteerHours;
SELECT parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE volunteer_hours > 10;
SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS total_parents, SUM(volunteer_hours) AS total_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE volunteer_hours > 10 ORDER BY parent_name ASC;
SELECT parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE parent_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY volunteer_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE parent_name LIKE 'A%' OR parent_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT parent_name, SUM(volunteer_hours) AS total_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours GROUP BY parent_name HAVING total_hours > 20 ORDER BY total_hours DESC;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, volunteer_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE volunteer_hours < 5 OR volunteer_hours > 50 ORDER BY volunteer_hours ASC, parent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_volunteer_hours;
SELECT parent_name, hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer_hours;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM parent_volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT school_name, total_volunteer_hours FROM school_recognition;
SELECT school_name FROM school_recognition WHERE total_volunteer_hours < 100;
SELECT parent_name, hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer_hours WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT school_name, total_volunteer_hours FROM school_recognition ORDER BY total_volunteer_hours DESC;
SELECT parent_name, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer_hours GROUP BY parent_name;
SELECT school_name, AVG(total_volunteer_hours) AS average_hours FROM school_recognition;
SELECT parent_name, hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 10 ORDER BY parent_name ASC, hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentVolunteerHours ORDER BY parent_id ASC, volunteer_date DESC;
SELECT parent_id, hours_spent FROM ParentVolunteerHours WHERE hours_spent > 5;
SELECT school_name, location FROM School WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerIncentives ORDER BY incentive_id DESC;
SELECT parent_id, MAX(hours_spent) AS max_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours GROUP BY parent_id;
SELECT * FROM ParentVolunteerHours ORDER BY volunteer_date DESC, hours_spent ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT parent_id, SUM(hours_spent) AS total_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours GROUP BY parent_id HAVING total_hours > 20

SELECT p.parent_id, p.volunteer_date, v.incentive_description FROM ParentVolunteerHours p JOIN VolunteerIncentives v ON p.hours_spent >= v.required_hours WHERE p.volunteer_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT s.school_name, COUNT(p.parent_id) AS total_parents FROM School s LEFT JOIN ParentVolunteerHours p ON s.school_id = p.parent_id GROUP BY s.school_name ORDER BY total_parents DESC

SELECT DISTINCT p.parent_id, p.volunteer_date, SUM(v.required_hours) AS total_required_hours FROM ParentVolunteerHours p JOIN VolunteerIncentives v ON p.hours_spent >= v.required_hours GROUP BY p.parent_id, p.volunteer_date HAVING total_required_hours > 30
SELECT * FROM parent_volunteer;
SELECT parent_name, hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;
SELECT school_name, address FROM school WHERE school_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM volunteer_event WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, hours_attended FROM parent_volunteer JOIN volunteer_attendance ON parent_volunteer.parent_id = volunteer_attendance.parent_id ORDER BY hours_attended DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_volunteer ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT parent_name, hours_worked FROM parent_volunteer WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT school_name, address FROM school WHERE school_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_event ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT parent_name, event_name, hours_attended FROM parent_volunteer JOIN volunteer_attendance ON parent_volunteer.parent_id = volunteer_attendance.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM parent_volunteer_hours;
SELECT parent_id, volunteer_date FROM parent_volunteer_hours ORDER BY volunteer_date ASC;
SELECT parent_name, email_address FROM parent_information WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM school_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reward_name, LEFT(reward_description, 20) AS short_description FROM rewards;
SELECT parent_name, email_address FROM parent_information LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM parent_volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT parent_id, volunteer_date FROM parent_volunteer_hours ORDER BY volunteer_date DESC;

SELECT parent_name, activity_name, hours_worked FROM parent_information JOIN parent_activity_hours ON parent_information.parent_id = parent_activity_hours.parent_id JOIN school_activities ON parent_activity_hours.activity_id = school_activities.activity_id;
SELECT parent_id, reward_name, reward_description FROM parent_information, rewards WHERE parent_information.parent_id = 1;
